protein.specific_function: Inhibitor of phospholipase A2, also possesses anti- coagulant properties. Also cleaves the cyclic bond of inositol 1,2-cyclic phosphate to form inositol 1-phosphate

reference.reference_text: Pepinsky RB, Tizard R, Mattaliano RJ, Sinclair LK, Miller GT, Browning JL, Chow EP, Burne C, Huang KS, Pratt D, et al.: Five distinct calcium and phospholipid binding proteins share homology with lipocortin I. J Biol Chem. 1988 Aug 5;263(22):10799-811.
